attributes.action: George Osbourne should resign as a Member of Parliament for Tatton Consituency
attributes.background: Ex-chancellor George Osbourne has taken a job editing the Evening Standard 4 days a week. This job will take up a large percentage of his time. The two roles will be impossible to deal with concurrently without his public duties suffering. He should do the honourable thing and step down immediately

rejection.details:
Complaints about breaches of the House of Commons Code of Conduct are investigated by the Parliamentary Commissioner for Standards, who is independent of Parliament and Government. You can find out more about the Commissioner and her role here:

http://www.parliament.uk/pcs
